biotools.summary: IPPI-DB is a database of modulators of protein-protein interactions. It contains exclusively small molecules and therefore no peptides. The data are retrieved from the literature either peer reviewed scientific articles or world patents. A large variety of data is stored within IPPI-DB: structural, pharmacological, binding and activity profile, pharmacokinetic and cytotoxicity when available, as well as some data about the PPI targets themselves.
